item.immersive_aircraft.rotary_cannon.de: A cannon of swift discharge, running with gunpowder.
item.immersive_aircraft.bomb_bay.descrip: Drops TNT, doth not destroy blocks but deal heavy damage.
item.immersive_aircraft.telescope.descri: A bulkier version of the spyglass.
item.immersive_aircraft.heavy_crossbow.d: A heavy crossbow with a powerful punch, require arrows.
item.immersive_aircraft.airship.descript: Airships may not be the fastest vehicle, but they sure are easy to maneuver.
item.immersive_aircraft.cargo_airship.de: Slow and fuel-hungry, yet doth bear an entire storage.
item.immersive_aircraft.warship.descript: A flying fortress, slow yet heavily armed.
item.immersive_aircraft.biplane.descript: This trusty, rustic biplane will take thee anywhere fast and rather reliably. Make sure thy runway is long enough.
item.immersive_aircraft.gyrodyne.descrip: Who needs an engine if one could power the aircraft with pure brawn? Give it a good push and off it flies!
item.immersive_aircraft.quadrocopter.des: A masterwork of engineering! 4 rotors strapped to some bamboo. Perfect for building, and that's about it.
item.immersive_aircraft.bamboo_hopper.de: A chonky aircraft with three seats and pontoons to land safely on water.
immersive_aircraft.gyrodyne_target_reach: Minimum rotor speed attained, ready for takeoff!
immersive_aircraft.invalid_dimension: This aircraft doth not work in this dimension.
immersive_aircraft.fuel.out: Thou hast run out of fuel!
immersive_aircraft.fat.out: Thou art too famished to fly!
option.immersive_aircraft.separateCamera: Employ a separate camera whilst in aircraft.
option.immersive_aircraft.useThirdPerson: Defaults to third person visage within aircraft.
option.immersive_aircraft.useCustomKeybi: Employ multi-keybindings, may break certain mods.
option.immersive_aircraft.showHotbarEngi: Render the engine gauge over the hotbar.
option.immersive_aircraft.crashDamage: Doth damage the player upon a crash.
option.immersive_aircraft.preventKillThr: Shall not kill the player upon a crash.
option.immersive_aircraft.healthBarRow: Offset the health bar of vehicles.
option.immersive_aircraft.damagePerHealt: Higher values make aircraft more durable.
option.immersive_aircraft.weaponsAreDest: Permit some weapons to demolish blocks.
option.immersive_aircraft.dropInventory: Cast down the inventory, instead of saving it within the aircraft item.
option.immersive_aircraft.dropUpgrades: Cast down the upgrades and customization, instead of saving it within the aircraft item.
option.immersive_aircraft.regenerateHeal: Regenerates health automatically every given tick, simulating vanilla behaviour.
option.immersive_aircraft.requireShiftFo: Repair only when holding shift, else merely enter the vehicle.
immersive_aircraft.tooltip.no_target: Needs must be assembled upon the floor!
